replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: I want him to win, but at least be honest. He is a shovinist pig. See. That's what's wrong, he speaks what he thinks. His supporters don't.

replies.author: Curtis
replies.text: Please. He doesn't love anyone except himself and foreign leaders/banks that funnel him money.
